DOC.detailed_description: After informed consent , investigator randomize 180 type 2 diabetes interventiona group ( 25-hydroxy vitamin 2000 IU+ elemental calcium 200mg per day ) placebo group ( elemental calcium 200mg per day ) . The participant control diabetes oral medication lifestyle intervention intervention period . Investigators exclude participant take vitamin D calcium anti-osteoporotic drug . Investigators also exclude renal insufficiency ( Cr > 1.5 men Cr > 1.4 woman ) heavy alcoholic . Investigators follow participant 24 week . After randomization , investigator check HbA1c , glucose , calcium , 25-hydroxyvitamin , AST , ALT , Creatinine , Parathyroid hormone , bone-specific alkaline phosphatase , serum CTX , brachial-ankle pulse wave velocity , central blood pressure , aortic augmentation index , precontrast liver compute tomography . Also investigator check body weight , height , peripheral blood pressure . At 12 week , investigator check HbA1c , 25-hydroxy vitamin D , AST , ALT , calcium , creatinine . At end study ( 24 week ) , investigator check HbA1c , glucose , AST , ALT , Creatinine , calcium , bone-specific alkaline phosphatase , serum CTX , brachial-ankle pulse wave velocity , central blood pressure , aortic augmentation index , precontrast liver compute tomography . After study complete , investiators compare data interventional group placebo group .
